Dear (Customer name),
This email is to advise the shipment for the following:
PO# SO# Product Qty PL# Container# Seal # Pickup date Sailing date Invoice#
Attached are the shipping documents, flash test data and the billing invoice for your reference. Please contact us immediately should you have any question about this/these shipment/s.
Best regards, (Name) (Position Title/Signature Block)
